actions.committee: House Committee on Banking and Currency
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking and Currency.

official_title: A bill to amend the Small Business Act, as amended, to provide financial assistance to small business concerns in converting to the metric system of weight and measures.

summary.text: Provides, under the Small Business Act, financial assistance to small business concerns for the purpose converting to the metric system of weights and measures.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Small Business Act, as amended, to provide financial assistance to small business concerns in converting to the metric system of weight and measures.
